name: Tainted Fate
description: Play as a demon in this story driven slasher horror game. Summoned from the depths of hell into our world, use your demonic abilities to gruesomely take down everything between you and your path back to the underworld. Be the horror.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
